title: Obama '08 Font
content:
Can someone identify for me the all caps, serif font used on some of the Obama campaign materials?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090504083410im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/obama_3583.jpg)
author: pennANDink

comments.content: Thanks, I’d been looking all over for another forum talking about the serif font, but couldn’t find any.
